channel.title: Registering server to Server Status list
channel.description:
Pretty simple how do you register your server to the server status list
It says my server is offline but i think it is onlinePLEASE HELP

item.title: Registering server to Server Status list
item.dc:creator: @zezi111 zezi111
item.description:
@zezi111 wrote:

To make a no-ip sever follow this link. www.portforward.con and select your router then for the game part click the first option. And to register server must be no-ip and server must be running or it will say it’s offline

Read full topic
item.source: Registering server to Server Status list

item.title: Registering server to Server Status list
item.dc:creator: @killing4apples killing4apples
item.description:
@killing4apples wrote:

idk i think i’m running hamachi and it says it cant be hamachi server

how do i make a no-ip server

Read full topic
item.source: Registering server to Server Status list

item.title: Registering server to Server Status list
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

Is it a Hamachi server? If so, you will not be able to post it on the Server Status list, please read the FAQ’s at the top of this board for more information.

Read full topic
item.source: Registering server to Server Status list

item.title: Registering server to Server Status list
item.dc:creator: @Red_Wave Red Wave
item.description:
@Red_Wave wrote:

Are You running your no-ip? If you are, let server run a few minutes then try again
